version_description:
• Database update
• Bug fixes

• Database update
• Bug fixes

• List of all monsters (IAP) [Note: Monster guides will be added soon]
• Treasures are now trackable
• Added pictures to compendium
• Added locations necessary for 100% map completion
• Extended amiibo list
• Reworked map settings and introduced a new group feature
• Fixed a issue where the map database was not stored correctly
• Fixed a bug with the loading times of the Weapons & Items page (IAP)
• Stability and performance improvements

• List of all monsters (IAP) [Note: Monster guides will be added soon]
• Treasures are now trackable
• Added pictures to compendium
• Added locations necessary for 100% map completion
• Extended amiibo list
• Reworked map settings and introduced a new group feature
• Fixed a issue where the map database was not stored correctly
• Fixed a bug with the loading times of the Weapons & Items page (IAP)
• Stability and performance improvements

• Added support for SplitView on iPads.
• Added strategies to monster page.
• Added objectives, pots and rafts to the map.
• General bug fixes and performance improvements.

• Added support for SplitView on iPads.
• Added strategies to monster page.
• Added objectives, pots and rafts to the map.
• General bug fixes and performance improvements.

• Added content for DLC 1 including locations of each new item and information for each new side quest
• Fixed an issue with the map filter / done state after switching the page
• Added first blupee locations (blue shiny rabbit)
• Added "Follow the Flower"-Korok lines
• Fixed a bug with the map data download (not enough storage)
• Fixed a bug where sometimes the restore function does not work as expected
• General bug fixes and performance improvements

• Added content for DLC 1 including locations of each new item and information for each new side quest
• Fixed an issue with the map filter / done state after switching the page
• Added first blupee locations (blue shiny rabbit)
• Added "Follow the Flower"-Korok lines
• Fixed a bug with the map data download (not enough storage)
• Fixed a bug where sometimes the restore function does not work as expected
• General bug fixes and performance improvements

• Added guides for "Trial of the Sword (DLC)"
• Added Breath Companion entry to iOS Settings App
• Added more 3D-Touch quick actions
• Added a Breath Companion Widget
• General bug fixes
• Stability and performance improvements

• Added guides for "Trial of the Sword (DLC)"
• Added Breath Companion entry to iOS Settings App
• Added more 3D-Touch quick actions
• Added a Breath Companion Widget
• General bug fixes
• Stability and performance improvements

• Added a Map-Zoom-Slider (configurable)
• "Keep screen active" is now configurable
• Added Copy & Paste functionality for progress data
• Compendium can now be tracked with a checklist
• Fixed a bug where some popup (and progress) entries did not work on the map
• Fixed a bug where the navigation from checklist to map creates the wrong icon
• Fixed a bug where the popup from 3D-Touch was sometimes not triggered
• Slightly reduced app size
• General bug fixes
• Stability and performance improvements

Note: App configurations can be done from the iOS Settings App and inside the App under Information/Settings (top right gear symbol).

• Added a Map-Zoom-Slider (configurable)
• "Keep screen active" is now configurable
• Added Copy & Paste functionality for progress data
• Compendium can now be tracked with a checklist
• Fixed a bug where some popup (and progress) entries did not work on the map
• Fixed a bug where the navigation from checklist to map creates the wrong icon
• Fixed a bug where the popup from 3D-Touch was sometimes not triggered
• Slightly reduced app size
• General bug fixes
• Stability and performance improvements

Note: App configurations can be done from the iOS Settings App and inside the App under Information/Settings (top right gear symbol).

• Lynels are now checkable (on the Map)
• Fixed a critical bug where the progress can get lost by switching between iCloud-Sync-Slots
• General bug fixes
• Stability and performance improvements

• Lynels are now checkable (on the Map)
• Fixed a critical bug where the progress can get lost by switching between iCloud-Sync-Slots

• Added search bar to Weapon Details page
• Fixed a bug with the scroll behavior of the Weapon Details page
• Fixed a bug with the scroll behavior of the Monster & Guides page
• Fixed a bug with the scroll behavior of the Trial of the Sword Guides page
• Changed the behavior of the map download (it should work now in the background too)
• General bug fixes
• Stability and performance improvements

• Added small enemies, enemy camps and wizzrobes marker

- Full app rework
- Added mulit-language support
- Added german translation
- Added partial french translation
- You can now place your own markers on the map
- You can filter the markers for their region
- You can search directly on the map
- You can now track the progress of your armor upgrades
- Added detailed statistics page
- Added watchOS support
- You can now change the app icon

- Full app rework
- Added mulit-language support
- Added german translation
- Added partial french translation
- You can now place your own markers on the map
- You can filter the markers for their region
- You can search directly on the map
- You can now track the progress of your armor upgrades
- Added detailed statistics page
- Added watchOS support
- You can now change the app icon

- Fixed data loss problem after migration
- Added option to re-migrate the data (can be found on the Informations page within the app)
- Performance fixes
- Extend french translation
- Added more alternative app icons
- Other stability and bug fixes


CHANGELOG FROM 3.0.0:
- Full app rework
- Added mulit-language support
- Added german translation
- Added partial french translation
- You can now place your own markers on the map
- You can filter the markers for their region
- You can search directly on the map
- You can now track the progress of your armor upgrades
- Added detailed statistics page
- Added watchOS support
- You can now change the app icon

- Fixed data loss problem after migration
- Added option to re-migrate the data (can be found on the Informations page within the app)
- Performance fixes
- Extend french translation
- Added more alternative app icons
- Other stability and bug fixes

- Added sponsoring leaderboards
- You can now show the current selected mode within the map
- You can now switch/copy/move your saves between the available modes
- Bug fixes
- Performance improvements

- Added an option "Top Marker Only". Per default you will now get a list of markers, if they overlap on the map. You can disable it with this option to get the old behavior back.
- Increased resolution of the map (You need to delete the map data and download it again to have the increased resolution)
- Bug fixes

- Added an option "Top Marker Only". Per default you will now get a list of markers, if they overlap on the map. You can disable it with this option to get the old behavior back.
- Increased resolution of the map (You need to delete the map data and download it again to have the increased resolution)
- Bug fixes
- Fixed the zoom limit issue to make various map markers visible again
- Fixed the zoom limit issue to make various map markers visible again

- Added checklist settings for filtering, grouping and sorting (access via cog symbol)- Grouped Shrines and Korok Seeds according to their region
- Added Speedrun Leaderboards (may require an IAP restore)
- Added Speedrun Timer (may require an IAP restore; currently only for presets of runs)
- Added a Star Fragment Guide
- Updated translations
- Performance improvements

- Stability improvements
- Bug Fixes:
+ Progress tracking
+ Selection of search bar
+ Zoom behavior
+ Incorrect color of search icon (iOS10 or earlier)
+ Missing header in chest checklist
+ Typos
